San_Mateo.CuriOdyssey: CuriOdyssey, formerly Coyote Point Museum for Environmental Education, and Coyote Point Museum, is an experiential science and wildlife center for children and families. Located at 1651 Coyote Point Drive in San Mateo, California, it is part of the Coyote Point Recreation Area, which overlooks the San Francisco Bay. The museum was founded in 1954 as the San Mateo County Junior Museum, and is accredited by the Association of Zoos and Aquariums (AZA).
